translation.Modele a interação e a navegação de sist: Model the interaction and navigation of interactive systems
translation.É um modelo de interação e navegação ori: It is a usability-oriented interaction and navigation model that aims to improve the quality of use of interactive systems.
translation.Descreve o comportamento entre o usuário: Describes the behavior between the user and the computer system.
translation.Compreende nós de navegação e fluxos de: Understands navigation nodes and navigation flows between nodes.
translation.Representa mecanismos de usabilidade que: Represents usability mechanisms that impact interaction.
translation.Confira a tese que iniciou o: Check out the thesis that started the
translation.sua maneira de interagir e navegar o sis: your way of interacting and navigating the system
translation.na etapa de análise e projeto: at the analysis and design stage

translation.Sua nova senha deve ser diferente das us: Your new password must be different from the ones you used previously.
translation.A senha deve ter pelo menos 8 caracteres: Password must be at least 8 characters long
translation.Não se preocupe, enviaremos as instruçõe: Don't worry, we will send you the recovery instructions.
translation.Enviamos um link para recuperação de sen: We have sent you a password recovery link.
